title: Facebook Outlines New Measures to Combat Racist Content

Tech Facebook Outlines New Measures to Combat Racist and Xenophobic Content German government called for social network to do more to censure growing wave of hate speech against migrants By Sam.Schechner@wsj.com Sept. 14, 2015 10:52 a.m. ET 
Facebook Inc. has announced new measures to fight xenophobic and racist messages on its platform, bending to pressure from the German government to clamp down on hate messages against migrants online.
